name: Mystery Shade
description: This polish was part of the Black Friday deals. So many of you liked it I decided to make it available to purchase. A fun festive glitter topper that is great for the season of any time wear!

name: Christmas Tree Baubles
description:
Christmas Tree Baubles is a fun mix of dots and stars in a clear base. When applied over green it looks just like a tree decorated with festive baubles! 

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

All of my polishes are three free (free of Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), Formaldehyde
and Toluene)

Due to the homemade nature of Trelly Polishes there may be a slight variation between bottles. I do my best to make them as uniform as possible. Computer screen settings may also change the appearance of the polish.

Nail Polish is extremely flammable, should not be ingested, and should not be used by children.

name: Rudolph Guide My Sleigh
description:
Rudolph Guide My Sleigh is a light brown crelly loaded with fun glitter. It has brown, white, red and gold glitter in fun shapes like hearts, dots, and stars. This polish will become opaque in roughly 3 coats or can be layered over another color. 

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

All of my polishes are three free (free of Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), Formaldehyde
and Toluene)

Due to the homemade nature of Trelly Polishes there may be a slight variation between bottles. I do my best to make them as uniform as possible. Computer screen settings may also change the appearance of the polish.

Nail Polish is extremely flammable, should not be ingested, and should not be used by children.

name: Fill Up The Toy Chest
description:
Fill Up The Toy Chest is a fun glitter topper with a youthful mix of glitters including Mickey Mouse shapes, skulls & crossbones, stars and more! 

50% of the proceeds of this polish will be donated to Toys for Tots. We will be using the donated money to purchase toys for the Toys for Tots fundraiser. Everyone deserves a little holiday cheer! Your donations are GREATLY appreciated! This fundraiser will end 12/15

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

All of my polishes are three free (free of Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), Formaldehyde
and Toluene)

Due to the homemade nature of Trelly Polishes there may be a slight variation between bottles. I do my best to make them as uniform as possible. Computer screen settings may also change the appearance of the polish.

Nail Polish is extremely flammable, should not be ingested, and should not be used by children.

name: X&O Under the Mistletoe
description:
X&O Under the Mistletoe is a mix green, pink and white glitter that makes a fun glitter topper. It's got fun shapes including squares, circles, and snowflakes! 

** The snowflakes are heavy and will sink slightly. Some fishing may be required.**

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

All of my polishes are three free (free of Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), Formaldehyde
and Toluene)

Due to the homemade nature of Trelly Polishes there may be a slight variation between bottles. I do my best to make them as uniform as possible. Computer screen settings may also change the appearance of the polish.

name: A Very Mickey Christmas
description:
A Very Mickey Christmas is a fun glitter topper. Red, black, white and green glitter mix for the perfect holiday glitter with a fun surprise- Mickey Mouse shaped glitter! 

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

name: Santa's Cookies
description:
Santa's Cookies is a nude crelly with pink, red, green and white glitter. Opaque in 2-3 coats or a fun layering polish. Made to look just like cookies with sprinkles it is a fun holiday polish.

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

name: Hearts Stars Horseshoes
description:
Hearts Stars Horseshoes is a beautiful glitter topper with a huge variety of glitter. There is everything from hexes and squares to hearts and clovers! This polish looks amazing layered over most colors or can be worn alone if desired. 

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

name: Milk & Marshmallows
description:
Milk & Marshmallows is a white milky crelly with tons of fun matte glitters that range in size, shape and color. The glitter mix even includes hearts, stars, moons, and clovers! This polish will build in 2-3 coats or can be worn over another color for a layered look. 

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

name: Lucky Charms Duo
description:
The Lucky Charms duo includes two fun and unique polishes! 

The first is a glitter topper named Hearts Stars Horseshoes. It has dozens of different colors, shapes and sizes of glitter. Including hearts, moons, stars, and clovers along with hexes, squares and dots.

The second includes the same fun glitter mix but all in a milky white base that builds to opacity in 2-3 coats, or can be layered over a color for a fun different look!

This listing is for two full size bottles of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) They have two stainless steel mixing balls each and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

All of my polishes are three free (free of Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), Formaldehyde

name: Get Your Shine On
description:
Get Your Shine On is a clear top coat. This is to be used to seal in and protect your manicures. It gives a glossy finish and has a quick dry time. The polish sets in a minute and dries completely in only a few minutes. This top coat is 3-free.

This listing is for one full size bottle of polish. (15 ml/.5 fl oz) It has two stainless steel mixing balls and may require a topcoat for a smooth finish.

description:
